title: 'The In Crowd': An Audience-Fueled Jazz-Pop Crossover Hit
teaser: Fifty years ago in a Washington, DC nightclub, the Ramsey Lewis Trio recorded "The In Crowd," a rare jazz single that landed on the pop charts. Critic Kevin Whitehead says the fans were half the show.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
